articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Ryugyong Dental Hospital, Okryu Children's Hospital
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Ryugyong Dental Hospital, Okryu Children's Hospital
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to Ryugyong Dental Hospital and Okryu Children's Hospital.
					 Kim Jong Un looked round various places of Ryugyong Dental Hospital to acquaint himself in detail with the medical services and its management and operation, 
					
					 He asked the sick persons and their families at the waiting room and those under treatment what they were suffering from. He told doctors to treat them well.
					
					 He said he could notice brisk medical treatment at the hospital as it had a lot of visitors. He said with joy that it was a good job to have built the hospital.
					
					 After being told that the hospital was very popular among people though it was not long since it has been opened to visitors, he said that the WPK built the hospital not to introduce the dental hospital at the world level but to let the people live in luxury and comfort under socialism in good health.
					
					 After learning in detail about the issues arising in consolidating the material and technological foundation of the hospital and in treating sick persons, he said that the Party would make sure that all issues would be settled.
					
					 He underlined the need for the medical workers to steadily improve the level of their technical skills and take good care of the medical equipment like the apples of their eyes.
					
					 He also visited Okryu Children's Hospital to learn in detail from its officials if there is any problem in managing and operating the hospital and healthcare.
					
					 Saying that the hospital had been built to let the children grow up in good health, he solved the issues arising in the management and operation of the hospital then and there.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the medical workers at those hospitals would take the lead in giving full play to the validity and vitality of the party's policy on public health and the socialist healthcare system.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Hwang Pyong So and Ri Jae Il, first vice-department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from President of Tatarstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from President of Tatarstan
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation, now on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, by President Rustam Minnikhanov on Saturday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets President of Tatarstan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets President of Tatarstan
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation, and his party, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.

articles.title: President of Tatarstan Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
President of Tatarstan Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation, and his party visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who made immortal contributions to boosting the DPRK-Russia friendly relations.
					
					 Entering the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, the guests made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 Rustam Minnikhanov made an entry in the visitors' book.

articles.title: President of Tatarstan and His Party Leave
articles.content:
President of Tatarstan and His Party Leave
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation, and his party left here on Saturday.

articles.title: Greetings to Pakistani President
articles.content:
Greetings to Pakistani President
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Mamnoon Hussain, president of Pakistan, on the occasion of the Day of Pakistan. 
					 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop favorably, Kim wished the Pakistani president and people bigger successes in their work of achieving the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Pakistani PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Pakistani PM
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif, on the occasion of the Day of Pakistan.
					 The message wished the prime minister and government of Pakistan bigger success in their work for achieving the steady socio-economic development of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Public Health Leaves for India
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Public Health Leaves for India
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Public Health of the DPRK led by Minister Kang Ha Kuk left here on Saturday to attend the 7th Meeting of the Regional Certification Committee for Polio Eradication organized by the WHO Southeast Asia Regional Office to be held in New Delhi, India.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Construction of Satellite Scientists Street
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Construction of Satellite Scientists Street
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, made a field survey of the construction of Satellite Scientists Street.
					 The construction of "Satellite Scientists Street" named by supreme leader Kim Jong Un is under way in the Unjong Science District associated with the leadership feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Looking round various places of the construction site, the director learned about in detail the project progressing apace to implement the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, greatly encouraging the soldier-builders.
					
					 He called upon the soldier-builders to complete the construction in the shortest time in the same spirit and stamina as they created a new a-match-for-a-hundred attack speed in the 21st century, the "Speed on Masik Pass", bearing deep in mind the mission as the army of the Supreme Commander and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He underlined the need to pay the primary attention to ensuring the quality of the structures to build the street impeccable in a distant future true to the Supreme Commander's noble idea of attaching importance to science, and for related units to successfully supply equipment and materials needed for the construction.

articles.title: Water-based Energy Production Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Water-based Energy Production Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Today is World Water Day. The United Nations designated this year's theme as "Water and Energy". 
					 On this occasion diverse events took place in the DPRK.
					
					 The country, rich in water resources, strives to turn out much energy with use of hydro-power.
					
					 Many big and minor hydro-power stations have been built across the country, thanks to the far-reaching plan of President Kim Il Sung, who suggested depicting a hydro-power station in the national emblem, and to the energetic efforts of leader Kim Jong Il, who called for building hydro-power stations in an extensive way. 
					
					 It is one of the major policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to increase electric power production for economic growth and improvement of the people's living. 
					
					 Under this policy, survey of water resources available was conducted on a nationwide scale and such large-scale hydro-power stations as power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River and Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station are now being built in the country.
					
					 Home-made high-efficiency generating equipment and water turbines have been applied to the already-built hydro-power stations while a project for new hydraulic structures is making headway.
					
					 The Korean people's efforts to solve the electricity shortage on the basis of water resources under the WPK guidance will bring good results.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Efforts to Improving Quality of Products
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Efforts to Improving Quality of Products
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A brisk campaign is conducted to improve the quality of products in the DPRK.
					 The State Commission of Quality Management has striven for raising the quality of products, regarding it as an important demand for the building of an economic power and as a work to stir up the people's national pride and self-esteem.
					
					 The Commission took steps for its affiliated units to put emphasis on the standardization of products, steadily improve their standards on a unified basis in reflection of the consumers' demands and combine utility with aesthetic value in working out industrial art designs.
					
					 It set up a model supervisory office in each province for all other offices to let the production units pay deep attention to raising quality.
					
					 The supervisory offices have often organized inter-sector shows of quality products in an effective way, while urging the industrial establishments and service units to use the registered measuring instruments.
					
					 All production units are asked to strictly observe the order of forwarding and selling any products after taking quality inspection and assurance.

articles.title: 29th Provincial (Municipal) Science and Technology Festivals Held
articles.content:
29th Provincial (Municipal) Science and Technology Festivals Held
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The 29th Provincial (Municipal) Science and Technology Festivals took place from February 25 to March 21. 
					 The events brought together scientific research institutes, educational institutions, industrial establishments and co-op farms selected in the city (district) and county festivals, scientists and technicians and many other working people. 
					
					 Presented to the festivals were thousands of papers and products conducive to the development of national economy and science and technology and improvement of the people's living standard. 
					
					 There took place presentation and exhibition of science and technology, exchange of new technology and lecture on latest technology, etc.

articles.title: 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival to Be Held
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is to be held in Pyongyang to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 The festival will bring together art troupes, dancing troupes and circuses of dozens of countries made up of international and national concours winners and famous artistes, overseas Korean art troupes and Korean artistes.
					
					 The festival will offer a significant occasion in promoting the cultural exchange and cooperation among artistes of various countries as they will make an artistic representation of the unanimous desire of the Korean people and world people valuing independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Imperialist Ideology and Culture Are Leading Part in Aggression: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Imperialist Ideology and Culture Are Leading Part in Aggression: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Whereas the reactionary ideology and culture of the imperialists were their guide to aggression in the past, they are playing a leading part in aggression at present, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article. It goes on:
					 By infiltrating their reactionary ideology and culture, the imperialists are gaining their purpose for aggression they find it hard to do through military provocation.
					
					 The anti-imperialist and independent regimes toppled down in some countries and the pro-U.S. regimes established instead as the people of those countries danced to the tune of the U.S. false propaganda, taken in its nonsensical drumbeats.
					
					 In an attempt to make those countries corrupt and degenerated and pull down them, the imperialists have conducted all open operations to infiltrate the bourgeois ideology and life style into them. Those countries, however, did not take any measure to cope with it. As a result, rotten ideology and culture of the imperialists swept across society.
					
					 If the imperialist ideological and cultural poison is overlooked, it makes it possible for the counter-revolutionary forces to raise their heads.
					
					 The counter-revolutionary forces leave all gains of revolution achieved through the protracted struggle to the tender mercy of the imperialists in collusion with them.
					
					 The "color revolution" in various countries is a product of the criminal anti-government campaign launched by the reactionary forces while expanding their influence rapidly, infected by the ideology and culture of the imperialists and backed by them.
					
					 This goes to prove that the ideology and culture of the imperialists are playing a leading part in their aggression at present.
					
					 If the ideological and cultural poison of the imperialists is allowed, it is impossible to defend socialism and achieve the independent development of the country and nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Make Apology and Reparation for Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Make Apology and Reparation for Its Past Crimes
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government is making desperate efforts to conceal its past crime-woven history. It is calculating that if then, this will establish an outlook on history with which the Japanese can feel a "sense of pride".
					 Japan persists in its moves to distort history but it will get nothing but international isolation, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary. 
					
					 The crimes of the Japanese imperialists are not an issue confined to Japan but an international issue as they were committed in many countries of the world, the commentary says and goes on:
					
					 It is Japan's past crime-woven history which can be neither erased by a huge amount of money nor changed through revision of the contents of history textbooks and amendment of the basic law on education. 
					
					 The Japanese government's attempt to distort and conceal the crime-woven history of the Japanese imperialists is the waste of time and efforts and a foolish act of hurting it of its own accord. 
					
					 The Japanese government should stop vain efforts and admit the heinous inhuman crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists and make an apology and reparation for them at an early date, though belatedly. 
					
					 Doing so is the only way out for Japan to imposingly live, trusted by the international community, free from sense of sin pent up for more than half a century.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Brands IS as "Agency Specializing in Fabricating Spy Cases"
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Brands IS as "Agency Specializing in Fabricating Spy Cases"
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A member of the editorial board of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made public an article titled "There is 'Agency Specializing in Fabricating Spy Cases' in Seoul" on March 19. 
					 The article said the news of the fabrication of spy cases reported in south Korea every day makes people feel as if they were living in the era of "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The fact that poor plots are hatched against the people and wanton human rights abuses are repeating themselves is sparking off resentment and despair. 
					
					 Just as  the spy case against a Seoul City government official turned out to be totally fabricated recently, once again stunning the world, the Intelligence Service (IS) kicks up rackets against "pro-north," "north followers" and "Reds" any time and any place, when necessary. 
					
					 Recently the "Saenuri Party" brought groundless charges called an attempted rebellion against lawmaker Ri Sok Gi from the Unified Progressive Party and other personages, making them victims of its operations to prolong its power. 
					
					 The ruling party tries to nip in the bud progressive forces by use of the IS to cover up its seizure of power through "government" bodies' interference in the election and scandals. 
					
					 The IS is squandering money for the fabrication of spy cases. 
					
					 Many people commit suicides due to abject destitution. The IS, however, is spending an astronomical figure of money collected from the people as  taxes for cooking up such charges of "spies", "followers of the north," "Reds" and "attempted rebellion" against innocent people. 
					
					 Had those who killed themselves because of hard living seen this dirty and disgusting plight, they would have urged the IS to rename itself "Agency Specializing in Fabricating Spy Cases." 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should divert the slush money used by the IS for maintaining the power seized through a fraudulent election to the purpose of improving the people's living and achieving their welfare, punish all those involved in the fabrication of the spy case and make apology to the people a hundred times, though belatedly.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed by the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan on March 18.
					 Ju Yong Il, chairman of the association, was elected the chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse events including a ceremony of presenting a floral basket, festival of the Korean national art and remembrance meeting to praise the revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Spain
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Spain
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A Spanish preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Barcelona on Mar. 17.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to widely introduce the revolutionary career and undying feats of the President and organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated by Syrian Political Party
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated by Syrian Political Party
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on Mar. 16.
					 Adnan Ismail, deputy general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Will Go into Bankruptcy: Indonesian Political Party
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Will Go into Bankruptcy: Indonesian Political Party
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The Pioneer Party of Indonesia released a statement on March 17 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is the harshest one aimed at undermining the ideology of the DPRK and bringing down its social system by dint of U.S.-style democracy and market economy, and swallowing up all Koreans and the whole of Korea by force of arms for aggression. Such policy has remained unchanged in the period ranging from the Truman Administration directly involved in the division of Korea to the present Obama Administration.
					
					 As far as the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula is concerned, it originated from the U.S. introduction of its nuclear weapons into south Korea in the 1950s from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK will go into bankruptcy as it does not understand the latter properly, turning a blind eye to the trend of the era.
					
					 The Pioneer Party of Indonesia recognizes that the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the U.S. hostile policy are just.
					
					 We will as ever positively support the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and its supreme interests.

articles.title: Halt to U.S. Interference in Internal Affairs of DPRK Demanded by Belarusian Political Party, Organizations
articles.content:
Halt to U.S. Interference in Internal Affairs of DPRK Demanded by Belarusian Political Party, Organizations
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The Communist Workers' Party and four organizations of Belarus including the National Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party" issued a joint statement on March 16 supporting the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK demanded in the statement that the U.S. should roll back its hostile policy and put an end to the nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 It also urged the U.S. to stop at once its groundless "human rights" racket.
					
					 We support the statement of the NDC of the DPRK and urge the U.S. to halt its interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is firmly standing against the U.S moves for stifling it.

articles.title: Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by Nigerian Figure
articles.content:
Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by Nigerian Figure
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on March 16 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 He said:
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK said in a statement that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is the harshest one aimed at undermining the ideology of the DPRK and bringing down its social system by dint of U.S.-style democracy and market economy, and swallowing up all Koreans and the whole of Korea by force of arms for aggression.
					
					 It clarified that the DPRK will make positive efforts to realize the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula, placing main emphasis on terminating the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK. 
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and I positively support the statement of the NDC of the DPRK, expressing belief that the Korean people making a dynamic advance for the final victory would shatter the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Peruvian Social Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Peruvian Social Body
Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship on its website on Mar. 17.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), indicates the tasks of resolutely defending and always adding luster to the revolutionary feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed all their lives, and their idea and feats.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Hospital de Estomatologia Ryugyong y Hospital de Pediatria Okryu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Hospital de Estomatologia Ryugyong y Hospital de Pediatria Okryu
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Hospital de Estomatologia Ryugyong y el Hospital de Pediatria Okryu.
					Estando en varios lugares del primer destino, el Mariscal hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de servicio medico y de administracion.
					
					Encontrandose con los enfermos y sus familias que esperan en la sala de espera y otros que reciben asistencia medica, les pregunto que tipo de asistencia medica van a recibir y donde les duelen y encomendo a los medicos tratarlos bien.
					
					Al subrayar que al hospital viene mucha gente, lo que insinua que las actividades de servicio medico estan en activo, se puso alegre por haberlo construido.
					
					Tras informarse de que el hospital gana reputacion entre los habitantes aunque lleva poco dias despues de su inauguracion, senalo que la edificacion del hospital no es para divulgar lo que tiene el hospital de estomatologia de talla mundial, sino para que el pueblo tenga buena salud y disfrute de la opulencia socialista.
					
					Al cabo de averiguar los asuntos que se presentan en las labores para la base material y tecnica y la curacion de los enfermos, dijo que el partido resolvera todos los problemas pendientes.
					
					Enfatizo que los funcionarios medicos de hospital deben mejorar sin cesar la capacidad tecnica y cuidar y administrar como las ninas de sus ojos las instalaciones y equipos medicos.
					
					Pasando por el segundo destino, averiguo detalladamente por parte de los funcionarios de hospital las dificultades que se presentan en el servicio medico.
					
					Al senalar que se construyo el hospital para que los ninos crezcan sanamente, soluciono en el terreno todos los problemas que se presentan en la gestion del hospital.
					
					Expreso esperanza y conviccion de que los dos hospitales estaran al frente del trabajo para demostrar la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica del partido en materia de la salud publica y el regimen de la salud publica socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Hwang Pyong So y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de presidente de Republica de Tatarstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de presidente de Republica de Tatarstan
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dirigiera el presidente de la Republica de Tatarstan de la Federacion Rusa, Rustam Minnikhanov, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 22 al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente pakistani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente pakistani
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de Pakistan, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, remitio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, Mamnoon Hussain.
					El remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en las labores para el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais y, expresa conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises seguiran desarrollandose positivamente en el futuro.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con presidente de Tatarstan y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con presidente de Tatarstan y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio hoy en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con Rustam Minnikhanov, presidente de la Republica de Tatarstan de la Federacion Rusa, y su comitiva quienes le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae visita campo de construccion de avenida de cientificos Wisong
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae visita campo de construccion de avenida de cientificos Wisong
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, averiguo en el terreno como marcha la construccion de la avenida de cientificos Wisong.
					En la zona cientifica de Unjong, donde estan impregnadas las huellas de direccion de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, se construye esa moderna avenida denominada asi por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					En su recorrido por varios puntos del campo, Choe estudio detalladamente el estado de construccion para el cumplimiento de la orden del Comandante Supremo y estimulo los exitos de lucha de los constructores militares.
					
					Teniendo presente de su mision de ejercito del Comandante Supremo y del partido, el EPC debe terminar esta obra lo mas pronto posible con el mismo impetu con que ha creado la "velocidad Masikryong", la nueva de ofensiva del siglo 21, instruyo.
					
					En acato a la noble idea del Mariscal de dar importancia a las ciencias, hay que prestar atencion primordial a la calidad de las construcciones, de modo que la avenida no tenga defectos hasta en el remoto futuro, dijo.
					
					Las unidades vinculadas deben suministrar en lo suficiente los equipos y materiales necesarios a la obra, apunto.
